name: Bike Race Stars - Highway Traffic Racer
name_original: Bike Race Stars - Highway Traffic Racer
description:
Another masterpiece from the creators of Traffic Racer. This time, you are behind the wheels of a motorbike in a much more detailed gaming experience, but useful retaining the old school fun and simplicity.

Now it's time to hit the roads with a motorcycle!

* FEATURES *
- Real motorcycle sounds effect
- First-person camera view
- 3D HD moto racing graphics
- 6 motorbikes to select
- Smooth steering control
- Fast motorbikes available
- Crazy addictive game-play
- Support for all languages
- Authentic 3D physics and feel good graphics
- Stunning motorcycle bike riding experience
- Easy to pick
- Hours of fun
- Choose your own colors
- Upgrade your bikes!
